title: Mexican finance ministry says fully behind Pemex on debt payments - Reuters.com
content: Mexican finance ministry says fully behind Pemex on debt payments  Reuters.com
description: The Mexican government is ready to make Petroleos Mexicanos' (Pemex) debt repayments whenever necessary, though higher oil prices have greatly improved the state oil firm's cash flow, Finance Minister Rogelio Ramirez de la O said on Thursday.
